page.title: 20Technology (Local Factories)
page.content: {Amphenol}make connections for circular sockets in hi-fis & computors _ 64 sockets in one range,125 in another. They make connections for military machines & planes.They have rooms for engineering, machinery, plastic & moulds & also electro plating. {Tankerton Automatics}make & repair arcade games.{Huyck}manufacture products to sell to the paper making industry.They have the most advanced weaving looms in Europe.{This Domesday {survey has been compiled by;}E.Wise, M.Izzard,M.Denby,N.Martin,F.Hughes,S. Hitchings,Y.Sealy,J.Mitchell,R.Johnson G.Whorlow,E.Leetham,G.Lumby,M.Tann, A.Crockford,F.Ball,A.Binding,P.Hickey, M.Stone,M.Goddard,C.Newlyn,R.Mitchell, K.Richardson,N.Summersby,L.Lane,K. Knapp,S.Drayson,V.Eames,C.Kingsnorth, L.Peaks,T.Rigden,H.Russell,D.Smith,L. Todd,C.Wyver,C.Spencer & Miss.Catling.
